text: Kothuru, or Kotturu is a village in Vijayawada (rural) mandal, located in Krishna district of Andhra Pradesh, India. The main occupation of the people in this village is farming. The village has fertile paddy fields irrigated with water from a common tank. There is a forest to the east of the village. == See also == *Vijayawada (rural) mandal == References == Category:Villages in Krishna district
title: Kothuru, Krishna district
